Package matrix

Class MatrixTools

  • java.lang.Object
    • matrix.MatrixTools
  • public class MatrixTools
extends java.lang.Object
    A class that provides static methods for performing matrix operations, similar to the default Math class While using static methods does not follow OOP conventions, it provides a way for people only familiar with procedural programming to work with the Matrix class in a friendlier and more intuitive way.
    Version:
    4-22-19
    Author:
    Brendan Caudill

    • Method Detail

      • add

        public static Matrix add​(Matrix addend1,
                         Matrix addend2)
        Addition of two matrixes (A + B = C)
        Parameters:
        addend1 - The first addend, Matrix A.
        addend2 - The second addend, Matrix B.
        Returns:
        The sum of the two addends, Matrix C.

      • subtract

        public static Matrix subtract​(Matrix minuend,
                              Matrix subtrahend)
        Subtraction of two matrixes (A - B = C) Another clever concept: Using addition to copy a matrix to a matrix of zeroes. Since the new matrix is already initialized on its own and filled with zeroes, using addition to copy is a way to sufficiently deep copy.
        Parameters:
        minuend - The first matrix to subtract from, Matrix A.
        subtrahend - The second matrix to use for subtraction, Matrix B.
        Returns:
        The result matrix, Matrix C.

      • multiply

        public static Matrix multiply​(Matrix factor,
                              double scalar)
        Multiplication of one matrix by a scalar (A * b = C)
        Parameters:
        factor - the Matrix to be multiplied, Matrix A.
        scalar - the scalar constant to multiply with, scalar b.
        Returns:
        the product Matrix, Matrix C.

      • multiply

        public static Matrix multiply​(Matrix multiplier,
                              Matrix multiplicand)
        Multiplication of two matrixes, A * B = AB
        Parameters:
        multiplier - The first matrix multiplier, Matrix A.
        multiplicand - The second matrix multiplicand, Matrix B.
        Returns:
        the product matrix, Matrix AB. (Will have A's rows and B's columns)

      • hasSameDimensions

        public boolean hasSameDimensions​(Matrix matrix1,
                                 Matrix matrix2)
        Check two matrices to see if they have the same dimensions
        Parameters:
        matrix1 - the first matrix to check
        matrix2 - the other matrix to check
        Returns:
        True if they have the same dimensions, false otherwise

      • canBeMultiplied

        public boolean canBeMultiplied​(Matrix matrix1,
                               Matrix matrix2)
        Check two matrices to see if they can be multiplied with eachother
        Parameters:
        matrix1 - the first matrix to check (Has n rows)
        matrix2 - the second matrix to check (Has n columns)
        Returns:
        true if matrix1 has the same amount of rows as the second has columns, false otherwise
